text: aur na kisee eemaanadaar mard ko ye munaasib hai aur na kisee eemaanadaar aurat ko jab khuda aur usake rasool kisee kaam ka hukm den to unako apane us kaam (ke karane na karane) akhateyaar ho aur (yaad rahe ki) jis shakhs ne khuda aur usake rasool kee naapharamaanee kee vah yaqeenan khullam khulla gumaraahee mein mubtila ho chuka
